title.en: An Aspiration Prayer for the Lives of the Supreme Holders of the Non-Sectarian Teachings

text.en: Unchanging Light1, Lord of Boundless Life2and the rest—
text.en-trans: ö migyurwa tsepakmé gön sok

text.en: By the truth of these conquerors throughout the ten directions and three times,
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum gyalwé denpa yi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who hold theBuddha'steaching,
text.en-trans: sangye tendzin palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: The three piṭakas and the nine successive vehicles—
text.en-trans: denö sum dang tekpa rim gu yi

text.en: By the truth of the holyDharmafree from attachment,
text.en-trans: damchö chak dangdralwé denpa yi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who are the source of supreme Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö chok jungné palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: The noble community of the conqueror's heirs, the bodhisattvas, the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas—
text.en-trans: gyalsé changsem nyenrang pakpé tsok

text.en: By the truth of theSanghawhose aspiration is unswerving,
text.en-trans: gendün miché dünpé denpa yi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who are the guides of the supreme community,
text.en-trans: tsok chok drenpa palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: The Lotus Born Vajra, Vimalamitra and the rest—
text.en-trans: tsokyé dorjé bimamitra sok

text.en: Through the blessings of the Vidyādharas, the root and lineage masters,
text.en-trans: rigdzin tsagyü lamé jinlab kyi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who are the supreme guides for beings,
text.en-trans: drowé dren chok palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: The maṇḍala of the five families who destroy the māra of the Lord of Death,
text.en-trans: chidak düjom rik ngé kyilkhor sok

text.en: And the other yidam deities of the four and six classes of tantra—through your compassion,
text.en-trans: yidam gyüdé zhi druk tukjé yi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who are the lords of the maṇḍala,
text.en-trans: kyilkhor wangchuk palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: Through the capacity and power of the ḍākinīs of the three places and the Dharma Protectors,
text.en-trans: yizhin khorlo drubpé gyalmo sok

text.en: The Wish fulfilling Wheel3, queen of accomplishment, and the rest,
text.en-trans: né sum khandro chökyong nütu yi

text.en: May the lives of the glorious gurus, who delight in the play of great bliss,
text.en-trans: dechen gyé rol palden lama nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: With their perfect qualities, those present at birth and those acquired in this life,
text.en-trans: kyé tob jor jung pünsum tsokpa yi

text.en: They illuminate the Conqueror's teachings—masters of exposition, debate and composition,
text.en-trans: gyalten sal dzé ché tsö tsompé dak

text.en: May the lives of the holders of theDharma of transmission, foremost among scholars,
text.en-trans: lung gi tendzin khepé khyuchok nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: Those who keep pure samaya, take the practice to heart,
text.en-trans: damtsik tsang zhing drubpa nyingpor dzé

text.en: And see the nature of phenomena are like adornments on the crowns of all, even the gods—
text.en-trans: chönyi dön zik lhar ché tsuk gi gyen

text.en: May the lives of these holders of theDharma of realisation, lords among yogis,
text.en-trans: tokpé tendzin naljor wangchuk nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: With the stable ground ofdiscipline, the clear light ofsamādhi,
text.en-trans: tsultrim zhi ten tingdzin nangwa sal

text.en: And the strength ofwisdom, they are rich with the wealth of the Noble Ones.
text.en-trans: sherab tsalden pakpé nor gyi jor

text.en: Lamps of the Muni's teachings, sources of refuge for beings,
text.en-trans: tubten drönmé drowé kyabné nam

text.en: May their lives remain secure and their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: Throughlisteningthey liberated their minds, throughcontemplationthey have clear discernment,
text.en-trans: töpé gyü drol sampé jedrak ché

text.en: And throughmeditationthey have realised reality—now they strive for others' benefit,
text.en-trans: gompé dön tok zhendön lhur dzepa

text.en: As wise, compassionate and powerful holders of the teachings of the Conqueror,
text.en-trans: khyentsé nüden gyalwé tendzin nam

text.en: May their lives remain secure and their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: Having practiced the various stages of the vehicles, in accord with their capacity,
text.en-trans: wangpor tsampé tek rim natsok la

text.en: They always act appropriately—
text.en-trans: lekpar zhuk né tsulzhin chöpa yi

text.en: May the lives of these great, non-sectarian masters, who reside in all directions,
text.en-trans: rimé kyé chen chok kün zhukpa nam

text.en: Remain secure and may their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: May all the holders of the teachings be forever in agreement,
text.en-trans: tendzin tamché pentsün tuktün ching

text.en: And without any bias or prejudice towards the Buddha's teachings,
text.en-trans: tubpé ten la chok khyer sel mepar

text.en: As they guard them, as if they were their own, with vast pure perception,
text.en-trans: daknang yangpö rang ten kyong zhindu

text.en: And may their lives remain secure and their enlightened activities increase and spread!
text.en-trans: zhabpé ten ching dzetrin rab pel shok

text.en: May all those who are connected to us, in all future lives,
text.en-trans: dakchak drel ché yangsi tamché du

text.en: Attain the seven qualities of the higher realms,
text.en-trans: nemé dorjé tsé dang zuk zang sok

text.en: Such as good health, indestructible vajra life and a beautiful form,
text.en-trans: tori yönten dün la wang jor né

text.en: And become like great suns illuminating all the Buddha's teachings!
text.en-trans: tubten yong kyi nangjé nyi gyur chik

text.en: May all obstacles to our life and liberation be pacified,
text.en-trans: tsé dang tarpé barché kün zhi zhing

text.en: May we live for hundreds of years and see hundreds of teachers,
text.en-trans: lo gya tso zhing tön gya tongwa dang

text.en: And through the three superior trainings, may we always uphold the precious teachings of the Conqueror,
text.en-trans: lhakpé labpé gyalten rinpoche

text.en: For as long as space exists, and for the benefit of others!
text.en-trans: namkha jisi zhen chir dzinpar shok

text.en: May the glorious gurus, who are the very face and embodiment of all the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyal kündü zhal palden lama dang

text.en: And all the holders of the non-sectarian teachings live long,
text.en-trans: rimé tenpa dzin kün tsozhé shing

text.en: And by turning the wheel of the Dharma without interruption,
text.en-trans: chökhor gyünché mepar korwa yi

text.en: May they always illuminate the three worlds, now and forever!
text.en-trans: jikten sumpo taktu nangjé shok
